quotes.quote: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: What’s the point of being alive if you don’t at least try to do something remarkable.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
quotes.author: Napolean Hill

quotes.quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones that do.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don’t raise your voice, improve your argument.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Your problem isn’t the problem. Your reaction is the problem.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can do anything, but not everything.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryun
